Name: Sex Apocalypse
About the game: Act as a surviving soldier of a special squad. Your main goal is not to die and have sex with as many girls as possible! You will be opposed by different monsters that will gradually infect you with a virus. And to prevent this, you will need to use the only effective medicine - sex. Levels and their sequence are always different. Therefore, starting a new game every time different locations will be waiting for you. And also, the longer you survive, the more enemies you will encounter at levels. At your disposal will be a huge arsenal of weapons. From banal pistols and assault rifles to absurd fighting bears and toilet grenade launchers. Key Features: *Dynamic gameplay with different types of difficulty that can please any players; *A large number of girls with different sex animations; *Weapon upgrade system; *The most spectacular killings are shown in slow motion; Get ready for the sex apocalypse!
